thread.title: Mustafa & Kiara Advani Starrer Machine Release Date Advanced To March 17
thread.title_full: Mustafa & Kiara Advani Starrer Machine Release Date Advanced To March 17

author: Koimoi.com Team
title: Mustafa & Kiara Advani Starrer Machine Release Date Advanced To March 17
text:
Mustafa & Kiara Advani Starrer Machine Release Date Advanced To March 17 By tweet The makers of the forthcoming coming film Machine , starring Kiara Advani and debutant Mustafa, have decided to release it a week earlier than scheduled. It was to release on March 24 but will now hit the screens on March 17, a statement said. ‘Machine’ release date advanced to March 17 The film is said to be the launchpad for Mustafa, the son of director Abbas Burmawalla of Abbas-Mustan duo fame. 
Machine is reported to be a love story with a twist, which is the signature style of the director duo who have given hits like Baazigar , Ajnabee , Race and Race 2 . TAGS
